content: oink oink here is a little pig right out of the yarn farm he is very easy to make and will make anybody fall for its cuteness skill level is easy you will just need a basic knowledge of crochet stitches such as single_crochet increase and decrease this little pig is about 5 inch in length 13 cm you will need just pink yarn to make it some ribbon of your choice a 2 75mm crochet hook the eyes are made with black safety buttons you can find at jo-anns or on etsy you can also replace them with felt or embroidery thread all the materials are listed on the pattern if you have any questions about this pattern don t hesitate to send me a message happy crocheting © copyright 2014 dolkapotsdesigns do not redistribute or resell this pattern
